# References {.unnumbered}

## Official Python Documentation

- [Python Official Documentation](https://docs.python.org/3/) - The official Python 3 documentation

- [PEP 8 - Style Guide for Python Code](https://peps.python.org/pep-0008/) - The official Python style guide

- [Google Python Style Guide](https://google.github.io/styleguide/pyguide.html) - Google's Python conventions
